original_text: Then I saw that there is more gain in wisdom than in folly, as there is more gain in light than in darkness.
korean_text: 내가 보니 지혜가 우매보다 뛰어남이 빛이 어둠보다 뛰어남 같도다

sentences.original_text: that there is more gain in wisdom than in folly
as there is more gain in light than in darkness.
sentences.korean_translation: 빛이 어둠보다 더 유익한 것과 같으니
